application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 8 (Trees and landscaping) of planning permission 25/00103 (Addition of bike store to front garden (excavation under front garden for bike store); full width lower ground floor extension at rear, to depth of existing closet wing; ground floor glazed rear extension to 1/3 width of house; addition of rooflights to proposed lower ground floor extension and AOV to second floor; addition of window to closet wing flank wall; replacement of pitched roof to closet wing rebuilt as flat parapet roof to match height of neighbouring property; replacement of dormer on rear elevation; replacement of all windows as double glazed timber sash windows to match existing; external landscaping to rear garden; internal reconfigurations throughout)
